column4: ok, I'll put it another way. How to remove firefox 9 completely without damaging anything. The software center will do the job?
i don't see why it wouldn't, it's just another front end for dpkg/apt
i'm not sure what you mean by "safe".  why do you want to remove FireFox?
you shouldn't need to reinstall it to get the german version.  i'm no expert on that tho, i always use engrish.
